attributes.action: "MPs who "act improperly" for their own benefit could be charged with a new offence of Political corruption
attributes.additional_details:
"MPs who "act improperly" for their own benefit could be charged with a new offence of Political corruption – and face a jail term of 14 years."
They should also be stripped of all honours awarded during time of office.
Government should be working for society in upholding their own honesty and integrity.
